title: mangaLamE shubha
sahitya:
mangaLamE shubha mangaLamE jaya


anupallavi

  pongum mangaLam engaNum tanguga pon maghaL kalai maghal innaruL Onguga


caraNam    sangam tarum uyar tamizh maNam paravuga taNNaLi anbaram taraimishaip-paDiga 
engum nirai nalam engum magizhvoli engum irai oLi enrum nilavuga
